Purpose: To culture and identify Campylobacter species in fecal specimens for accurate diagnosis and treatment guidance.
Container: Fecal transport media container kept at 2–8 °C
Equipment: 42 °C incubator, microaerophilic system (e.g., CampyPak), selective Campylobacter agar plates, pre-reduced thioglycollate broth, sterile inoculating loops, microscope with Gram-stain supplies, oxidase reagent
